pageContent: Background: Men with prostate cancer who undergo androgen deprivation therapy (ADT) are at risk for bone loss and fractures. Our objective was to determine if Medicare beneficiaries with prostate cancer in the state of Texas underwent DXA scans when initiating ADT.

metaData.source:
Lead time associated with screening for prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/14618626/
